@Abawcom

Reason 1) To complete the recording quicker.

Reason 2) To encode the torrent faster.

Reason 3) To upload torrent faster.

Reason 4) To seed smaller torrent faster. This torrent is 70% seeded but the show is still going on.

Reason 5) To not upload a huge torrent so late that no one needs it. The qualifying pre/post race show isn't as good or important as the race show which I always post.

Reason 6) Others will post the pre/post race torrent after me anyway so you can always download it from them instead of complaining on another torrent. That is something which clearly doesn't make sense to me.

I can keep on going all day but does that make enough sense for you?

Here is a version with Pre and Post Qualifying!!

Enjoy!

@nydownes

What a stupid comment to make. You think me uploading part of the race gives you a reason to judge me as a fan? Trust me mate, I've been watching F1 before you were born. I watch the races Live on my TV and I only upload it to other Formula 1 fans so they can also enjoy the sport I love so much. Sometimes I can upload the entire shows and even post race forums as you can see from my torrents and other times I can only record or find race only. Your comment is perhaps the most stupidest assumption I've seen on TPB.

Also to stay on that point, watching the pre-race post race show doesn't make you an F1 fan. The Sky and BBC shows are sometimes dumbed down to explain the races to normal F1 fans. The hardcore fans don't need 30 minutes of Pirelli tyre interviews explaining to them what the tyres do every race, nor do they need to see to see Charles Pic and his team mate racing toy cars in their factory. It is just time filler which many fans I know who have been watching races for decades don't really care about. 

If you've seen F1 as long as some of us have you get sick of these shows. I don't mind them and watch them if I'm not busy with work mostly but honestly the only thing that matters to me is the race, not the glamor, grid girls or walking Bernie stroll up and down the grid shaking hands with hollywood stars. 

So congratulations on making one of the stupidest comment on TPB, I applaud you for that.

@IAMH67

"Your comment is perhaps the most stupidest assumption I've seen on TPB."

???

Brilliant!!
